title: Jhin's Q only bouncing twice
body: I have been playing lots of Jhin recently (btw riot awesome job, hes got to be one of my new favs), and his Q seems to only bounce twice when there are multiple other targets within its range. Its upsetting for me to see my Q only bounce twice when it should bounce four times, harming my foes or giving me the last two minions. Thanks for reading this, have a nice day!

replies.body:
Hey TheLegend127 - 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are working to get a fix in ASAP! Take care! ^-^
